description:
Nakigitsune is enjoying cooking with Kogitsunemaru and Mikazuki Munechika. Watching this, Shishou thinking, "I can`t lose in the treatment of my elders," and along with Tsurumaru Kuninaga work together to come up with a plan to please Mikazuki Munechika. Meanwhile, dispatch orders come for Mount Atsukashi. Iwatooshi and Imanotsurugi are off to the place of Minamoto no Yoshitsune`s fate...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nagatsuki: Sono Kako ga Aru kara
September: That`s the Kind of Past I Have
長月 その過去があるから
